message: As a property manager, you might see things that would otherwise go unnoticed. It’s unlikely that this is going on in your community. But it’s also not impossible. If you and your staff are aware of certain things to look for, you might be able to do something, should you ever find yourself in the situation of suspecting one of your residents of being trafficked.

data.description: The crime can occur in cities, suburbs, or rural areas. It's often hidden in plain site. And it can occur anywhere. Even in apartment buildings. Here are some signs to look out for.
data.title: How to Be Aware of Human Trafficking in Apartments
